text: Mbega ntubona yuko Imana ariyo isunika ibicu hanyuma ikavyegeranya bimwe kubindi, mukanya ugaca ubona imvura ivuye murivyo, nayo imanura kuva hejuru y’imisozi yivyo bicu imvura y’urubura igashikira kuwo yishakiye canke nukudashikira kuwo yishakiye, hakaba hegereje umuco w’umuravyo wayo wohumisha amaso
